## 9.3

```{r}

diamonds %>%
  group_by(color)%>%
  summarise(size = mean(carat, na.rm = TRUE)) %>%
  arrange(desc(size)) %>%
  head(1)

```

# 1: J color diamonds are largest on average

```{r}

diamonds%>%
  group_by(clarity)%>%
  summarise(ave_table = mean(table, na.rm = TRUE)) %>%
  arrange(desc(ave_table)) %>%
  head(1)
```
